question: Which company signed a MoU with MSME for setting up two Technical Schools?
explanation: Samsung India signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) for setting up two new Samsung Technical Schools in Bengaluru and Jamshedpur. Samsung already runs 10 schools in the States of Rajasthan, Kerala, Bihar, Delhi and West Bengal.
